Content:
Lost oil pressure while riding!!

does this bike have an oil pressure sensor???

Oil looks Good, Coolant looks good...little rusty, fresh 10w/40 2.8 liters

ordering new oil pump and cleaning out old pickup.

i also just cleaned all the jets out and ****ed with the vacuum lines but i thought i got that back together right because the bike rode with 0 issues for several miles. and there was no air leak noise or missing hoses beside one breather line coming off of the tank.

heres what happened, riding in 4th gear and i feel a stutter, im thinking carb issue, shift up and give her gas it works through it, stuttering gets worse as im going up the hill and suddenly looses power to the throttle i pull over and as i come to a stop the oil pressure light comes on. Engine is not locked up oil and coolant are not leaking externally or internally as far as i know.

send help!
